conversations.content: What's a good summary of my 100 most recent transactions this year in terms of categories and amounts?

<function_thought>
To summarize the 100 most recent transactions for this year, I will first retrieve the transactions using the `get_most_recent_transactions` tool. After getting the transaction data, I will analyze it to categorize the transactions and summarize the amounts. Since the user asked for transactions specifically for this year, I will need to filter the results accordingly after obtaining the data.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_most_recent_transactions(n=100)]</function_call>

To summarize the transactions in terms of categories and amounts, I will categorize the provided transactions based on their subjects and calculate the total amounts for each category.
